item.title: cloud-init config
item.description:
Scope #

This page list the various cloud-init config file I’m using when creating a new server. Unless specified, I’m working with a Debian Bookworm install, on an ARM CPU, using Hetzner as a cloud provider.

Minimal cloud-init config #

This minimal config files sets up a user, gives it sudo privileges, sets up fail2ban and prevent SSH for root and without a SSH key.

Replace the content of the highlighted lines as specified.

item.title: Hugo cheat sheet
item.description:
Create new page #

I’m using the Hugo Book Theme, which means it will render the content of the content in the content/docs folder as a book.

So the creation of a new page go as such :

hugo new content content/docs/my-new-page.md

Serve locally #

Simply use hugo serve --disableFastRender. The disableFastRender option is there to ensure proper site construction, when you add page, for example.
